    Collection of Daladala Routes

    less than 1 minute read

    Map of public transport in Dar es salaam link

    Dar es salaam Transport

    Dar es Salaamâ€™s public transport systems is mainly centred around Daladala buses. In addition there is a train, ferry, and BRT system.

    As part of Ramani Huria team, In 2015 We worked together with ally (mobility based company) to map the entire public transport system in Dar es Salaam.

    The main activities were to organise and assign the mappers bus routes to collect.

    Mappers boarding Daladala buses to map routes

    You can watch the bus routes mapping here

    Wiki for the project can be found hereTransport wiki

    Updated: April 30, 2016
